page.title: 13LAMBEG/CASTLEROBIN LIFESTYLE
page.content: The area is predominantly composed of {middle-class}housing both residential and farmhouse.Most families have at least one car,colour t.v. and many have in recent years acquired video recorders. The housing is of the 3-4 bedroom semi-detached or detached "villa" or bungalow types of around 900-1200 sq.ft.size with garage and garden. Recent Political troubles mean that much{entertainment}is home based and many people only go out to organized social occasions or pre-booked events or meals.There are signs that more normal patterns are returning. People travel abroad,when possible for{holidays};Spain,Majorca and the Canary Islands being especially popular. {SEE **NOTE** {
